m_szDocSumamry: $500M Pledge From Total For PV And Other Renewables March 18th, 2016 by Sandy Dechert   Total, Europe’s third largest oil and gas company, has just announced a huge boost in future for the clean energy sector . The 2015 annual report indicates a growing share of PV production in the company’s income. In the 2015 report, Total had a net income in marketing and services segment (which includes activities in the new energy sector), of $1.7 billion.
